participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Resilient and determined, Alex channels her experiences into her work and personal life, striving for stability despite her challenges.
participant_1.background: my mom passed away when i was young. i work in the insurance business. my father is in the army. i recently was fired and had to get a new job.

participant_2.name: Michael Smith
participant_2.personality: Caring and optimistic, Michael finds joy in everyday moments and loves sharing experiences with his daughter.
participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i enjoy going to the park. i am a doctor. i am now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday.
